def Solve():

    s = a[0] | a[1]
    for i in range(1, n):
        s = s | a[i]

    q = q - 1

def min_sum(aa):
    all_bits = 0
    for x in aa:
        all_bits = all_bits | x
    return all_bits

    for i in range(1, len(arr)):

    return result

def solve(nums):
    mask = nums[0]
    sum_ = nums[0]
    for n in nums[1:]:
        n_ = n & ~mask
        mask |= n_
        sum_ += n_
    return sum_
T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    nums = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    print(solve(nums))
